section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this chapter, the term “merchant” means a person who does or would sell, lease, or transfer, either directly or indirectly, consumer goods or services, or a person who does or would supply the goods or services which are or would be the subject matter of a trade practice.

annotations.annotation: D.C. Law 17-353 added this section to Title 28, an enacted title of the District of Columbia Official Code.
